Name: Final Pilot
About the game: With easy-to-master controls, a simple objective, beautiful top-down 2D graphics and an 80’s arcade game spirit, FINAL PILOT is an online multiplayer battle royale set in the deepest reaches of uncharted space. Fun for the entire family and challenging enough for experienced players across the galaxy, begin your mission with a variety of customizable ship options then blast off into a fast-paced game of strategy, skill and blind luck with a singular objective in mind: SURVIVAL! Don’t just be the best… BEAT THE BEST (and look good doing it.) Collect health by destroying asteroids! Collect Buffs by destroying freighters! Collect 3 Buffs and unlock the Tri-Blaster! Pilots can use their starfighter’s onboard radar to locate asteroids and other in-game objects to get the edge on their opponents. Keep your wits and conserve your ammo as enemies lurk around every sector of this dangerous battleground! Then the ultimate challenge begins: “ DOOM MODE ”: the penultimate chapter in FINAL PILOT…where there are no do-overs and no coming back.
